name: PopulateSelectedProducts
action:
<*ASSIGNVALUE(MSID_Selected_Products:<* Eval(Replace("<*CTX( Container(MSID_Product_Container).UniqueValues(Product Name).Separator(
) )*>[IF]([EQ](<*CTX( Container(MSID_Product_Container_Virtualization_hidden).Rows.GetCount )*>,1)){[IF]([NEQ](<*CTX( Container(MSID_Product_Container).UniqueValues(Product Name).Separator(
) )*>,)){
}{}[ENDIF]Virtualization System}{}[ENDIF][IF]([GT](<*CTX( Container(MSID_Product_Container_Generic_hidden).Rows.GetCount )*>,0)){[IF]([NEQ](<*CTX( Container(MSID_Product_Container).UniqueValues(Product Name).Separator(
) )*>,)){
}{}[ENDIF]Generic System}{}[ENDIF]","
Project Management","")) *>)*>
